title: The Three Unwise Men
description:
New Merch: http://badfriendsmerch.com

Thank you to our Sponsors:  https://hellofresh.com/badfriends16 code: BADFRIENDS16

YouTube Subscribe: http://bit.ly/BadFriends

0:00 New Merch Announcement 

0:47 Happy 2022! 

4:47 Doc's Trans Vision Board 

8:46  A Broken Internal Clock

21:26 A Very Special Ted Talk 

35:45 New Year's Traditions 

45:36 The Three Kings  

53:58 A Toast To A Great Year 

1:00:05 New Year's Resolutions

Bobby Lee

TigerBelly: https://www.youtube.com/tigerbelly

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyleelive

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bobbyleelive

Tickets: https://bobbyleelive.com
